Html:
Hi, I have just created a web site app that uses FO.NET and it is extreamly slow and does hardly work. I got it to work once and the it seems like the CPU goes out the roof.

 

Any ideas on how / if it should work on Azure?

 

Thanks,

Rob
It works in Web Role but not in Website. I have also located the problem to the loading of the system fonts, maybe PINVOKE on native code.
